member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_DOUBLES
member.summary: Describes double data type support in the current graphics driver.

member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_DOUBLES.DoublePrecisionFloatShaderOps
member.summary: Specifies whether double types are allowed. If TRUE, double types are allowed; otherwise FALSE. The runtime must set DoublePrecisionFloatShaderOps to TRUE in order for you to use any HLSL shader that is compiled with a double type.
